game.name: Fastline Rivals
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fastline Rivals is a high-speed racing game featuring circuit, drift, rally, street, and highway races. Customize cars, master tracks, and become the ultimate racing rival!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fastline Rivals is a high-speed racing game featuring circuit, drift, rally, street, and highway races. Customize cars, master tracks, and become the ultimate racing rival!
